title: 'Best charger'
body: 'I use this for my iPhone 14pro … and trust meit does the job perfectly… charges my phone very fast… I buyed 4 of this pieces…'

title: 'Not for pixel phones'
body: I thought this will give quick charging for my pixel phone. But it doesn't.  Charging works with out any issue. Using more than 8mo.

title: 'power house'
body: The use of GaN technology makes this charger incredibly efficient and compact. It's smaller and more lightweight than traditional chargers, which is perfect for travelers and those with limited outlet space.and i bought black one especially because the color of the white one will be worn out

title: 'Morvaless..'
body: 'Grate productno heat fast charger...I like spigen company'

title: 'Not a fast charger at all!'
body: It's a basic charger which can not be called fast charger. Heats too much. Not worth buying.

title: 'Very compact and powerful charger.'
body: 'Does its job. Phone temperature is only slightly increased. easy to carry and sturdy'

title: 'Awesome'
body: 'Flawless fast charger'

title: 'Works Well for Pixel 7 Pro!'
body: The charger is working as expected so far and I have been using it for 2 weeks now. Most of the time my phone charges at night during my sleep hours in adaptive mode so I haven't gotten a chance to test the speed. Nothing to complain about so far.  UPDATE : It stays Cool & Easy to carry anywhere, Brand quality is Sturdy and no issue so far. Charges Quickly too and Size is Compact but If you have Budget I would suggest go for Belkin OR Anker Gan 100w instead in Sale or Prime Day Deals!

title: 'Great compact charger that works with most devices'
body: 'Bought this for charging my MacBook Air m1 and iPhone 12 (along with a 4 in 1 cable). Has been working great so far. Highly recommended.'

title: 'Too pricey'
body: 'Good'

title: 'Good quality'
body: 'No problems till now..Satisfied!'

title: 'Best Charger'
body: 'working perfectly  I am using it since last many days.'

title: 'Not aGAN'
body: 'It is not a GAN charger! gets heated up faster and slows down the battery?'

title: Flase claims of fast charging, Don't Buy
body: The media could not be loaded. DO NOT BUY THIS. I checked it both on Samsung phones and Iphones, It doesn't fast charge to It's full 30 watts, In Samsung phone the official one shows super fast charging and this one shows fast charging only, it means it's charing only at 15 watts. In iPhone the official one charges quick this one takes much longer. I Prefer the official one, the offical samsung charger price is almost the same for 25 watts.

title: 'Good charger'
body: 'Good charger Good price on Prime sale.'

title: 'Price is at slightly higher side.'
body: 'Good Charger & Great build quality.'

title: 'How to claim warranty?'
body: 'My product stopped working. How do I claim warranty?'

title: 'Nice product'
body: 'This is very good product and the adapter stays cool'

title: 'Best in class'
body: 'It charged my iPhone 14 in 1.5 hour and 2 hours 20 minutes for MacBook Pro M2 13 Just buy it you will not regret for sure'

title: 'Hopeless service. Don’t expect them to answer your phone or email'
body: 'I bought this product which stopped working in a week. I tried multiple times over phone and email to the contact provided by Amazon for the warranty claims. None answered also no reply from them.  Think twice before buying this.  I have great regards for the brand but this kind of response is not appreciated'

title: 'Charges with getting heated.'
body: 'It charges fast by strong cable but it heats up a lot. I tried first one later replaced it by another but both risen same issue. This GaN technology proved fail to keep it cool while charging.'

title: 'Stopped working'
body: 'The charger stopped working in 7 months. No way to claim warrenty in India'

title: 'False advertisement!! Getting really hot'
body: The media could not be loaded. It's getting really hot while charging even hotter than apple original charger... I am scared it might stop to work.. Will not recommend it

title: 'I just need this charger for my laptop iphone and a android phone'
body: 'Greatly reduced bulk for me in my backpack it does get hot when charging laptop nothing alarming but …also its built like a brick which is expected from a power “brick” would recommend'

title: 'Suddenly stopped working'
body: 'After 1 year of use it suddenly stopped working and i take utmost care of my stuff. It was working one day and the next day it wouldn’t'

title: 'Best Charger For Google Pixel 6 Pro'
body: 'It is one of the best charger for Google pixel 6 pro it may take around 1h 15min to fully charge compared to original google charger it is the best for this price range'

title: 'The product stopped working after 8 months.'
body: 'I didnt expect this will happen with Spigen products. It suddenly stopped working after 8 months of use.'

title: 'Power packed small charger'
body: It's a compact charger and does what it says. Have a very high efficiency and supports quick charging.

title: 'No Service Suport'
body: 'Quality is bad stopped working after 6 months. No after sales service. Better go with apple original or some other brand.'

title: 'Excellent quality'
body: 'Excellent quality product. Robust. Till now working fine.'

title: Defective product received, can't even replace or return
body: 'Stopped working within 15 days of use'

title: 'Not worth for Nothing phone 1'
body: 'I have apples 20w fast charger and i bought this spigen charger to get my phone quickly charged because the difference was 10 watts. I thought it might charged my device little faster from apples charger but it took 1 hour 12 minutes to charger my nothing phone 1 from 25% to 100% without any usage.. Better to go with samsung 25 watt pd charger. Samsung adaptor deliver high ampere. I have tested all three adaptors with nothing phone 1'

title: 'Small & Perfect Charger'
body: Purchased Month: December'22 Comment Month: June'23  It's impressive, looks good, small but charges fast. easy to carry along. Don't think twice just go ahead with this if you're looking for a 30W charger. It's worth it.

title: 'Good fast and efficient safe'
body: 'Good fast and efficient safe'

title: 'Extremely good build quality'
body: 'Overall very good premium design & finish & totally works as advertised.'

title: 'The worst product'
body: 'This product is just a hoax there’s no real GaN in it. It over heats the phone to extent where are not able to use it for few minutes. I have to replace my 13 pro max’s battery after a year of purchase. A absolute no for this product.'

title: 'Heating issues'
body: 'Both the charger and the iPhone is heating up. It’s charges fast but heating up.'

title: 'Unsatisfactory Purchase'
body: 'Just with use of less than 20 days charger stopped working not able reach and get the charger replaced. Would suggest not to buy products of Spigen in India as quality and after sales service both are missing.'

title: 'Asus Rog phone 2'
body: It's good for Asus Rog phone 2 but it doesn't charge in hyper charging mode..it's a fast charging for Asus Rog phone 2 loved the speed of charging and light weight smaller good to carry around

title: 'Not satisfied'
body: 'Not satisfied as per price.'

title: 'Dangerous charger -30W charger giving an output of 31W'
body: 'This Spigen Wall charger seems to be a dangerous one. the Charger described output is 30W but it gives an output of 31.2W which is dangerous. It doesnt have any power management. And temperature is 48 Deg Celsius and heats up the phone like anything. Do not buy this charger.'

title: Doesn't support fast charging for iPhone.
body: I have a iPhone 13, it doesn't fast charge it. Time taken is too long, multiple cables swapped, still same results. Useless product

title: 'Good'
body: 'Good build quality. No cable in provided in box. It heats up little like other chargers which is totally normal. Using for my nothing phone. Charges 14% in 10 minutes'

title: 'Suit best for Google Pixel 7.'
